* BrightBlade smiled at Gangon for his comment, she had never had anybot say 
that she was beautiful before. Besides, she was a sucker for sweet talk!*

" You had better watch what you say, Gangon. You might actually get a 
reaction that you happen to LIKE."

* BrightBlade winked at Gangon then looked ahead of her and at Hell Beast, 
it was then when she heard a strange and new voice behind her.
She understood the command and answered...*

" Function...Predacon spy and field soldier. Reason for being here...to 
pledge allegiance to the all mighty Hell Beast and his most powerful crew."
